languages.text: "Запрос принят". {n}Тени {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}мехадендритов{/g} надвигаются на пленника, заслоняют его. Вы слышите вой сверла, хруст кости и вопли. Когда Паскаль отходит, вы видите пару аккуратных кровоточащих дыр в черепе пленника и подергивающиеся зрачки разного размера.{/n}

"Request approved." {n}You watch the shadows of Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g} advance on the prisoner before the Tech-Priest's frame blocks your view. You hear the shriek of the drill, the crunching of bone, and screams. When Pasqal withdraws, you notice two bleeding, precisely made holes in the prisoner's skull, as well as his twitching, differently sized pupils.{/n}

languages.text: «Solicitud aprobada». {n}Ves las sombras de las {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mecadendritas{/g} de Pasqal acercarse al prisionero antes de que el cuerpo del tecnosacerdote bloquee tu visión. Oyes el chirrido del taladro, el crujido del hueso y los gritos. Cuando Pasqal se retira, distingues dos agujeros sangrantes y precisos en el cráneo del prisionero, así como sus pupilas, agitadas y de distinto tamaño.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Request approved." {n}You watch the shadows of Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g} advance on the prisoner before the Tech-Priest's frame blocks your view. You hear the shriek of the drill, the crunching of bone, and screams. When Pasqal withdraws, you notice two bleeding, precisely made holes in the prisoner's skull, as well as his twitching, differently sized pupils.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Solicitud aprobada». {n}Ves las sombras de las mecadendritas de Pasqal acercarse al prisionero antes de que el cuerpo del tecnosacerdote bloquee tu visión. Oyes el chirrido del taladro, el crujido del hueso y los gritos. Cuando Pasqal se retira, distingues dos agujeros sangrantes y precisos en el cráneo del prisionero, así como sus pupilas, agitadas y de distinto tamaño.{/n}

languages.text: 「リクエストを承認した」{n}パスカルの{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}機械触手{/g}の影が囚人に迫っていくのが、技術司祭の彼のフレームが視界を遮る前に見えた。ドリルの金属音、骨の砕ける音、悲鳴が聞こえる。パスカルが下がると、囚人の頭蓋骨に正確に開けられたふたつの血が滲む穴と、男のピクピクした大きさの違う瞳孔が視界に入った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Request approved." {n}You watch the shadows of Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g} advance on the prisoner before the Tech-Priest's frame blocks your view. You hear the shriek of the drill, the crunching of bone, and screams. When Pasqal withdraws, you notice two bleeding, precisely made holes in the prisoner's skull, as well as his twitching, differently sized pupils.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「リクエストを承認した」{n}パスカルの機械触手の影が囚人に迫っていくのが、技術司祭の彼のフレームが視界を遮る前に見えた。ドリルの金属音、骨の砕ける音、悲鳴が聞こえる。パスカルが下がると、囚人の頭蓋骨に正確に開けられたふたつの血が滲む穴と、男のピクピクした大きさの違う瞳孔が視界に入った。{/n}

languages.text: “请求已批准。”{n}帕斯卡的身躯挡住了你的视线，你看到这位技术神甫身上的{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}机械触须{/g}朝犯人不断逼近。随后，你听到了钻头的尖叫声、骨头的嘎吱声、犯人的嚎叫声。当帕斯卡离开的时候，你注意到他的头骨上出现了两个血洞，是以相当精确的手法钻出来的。犯人大小不一的瞳孔不断抽搐着。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Request approved." {n}You watch the shadows of Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g} advance on the prisoner before the Tech-Priest's frame blocks your view. You hear the shriek of the drill, the crunching of bone, and screams. When Pasqal withdraws, you notice two bleeding, precisely made holes in the prisoner's skull, as well as his twitching, differently sized pupils.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “请求已批准。”{n}帕斯卡的身躯挡住了你的视线，你看到这位技术神甫身上的机械触须朝犯人不断逼近。随后，你听到了钻头的尖叫声、骨头的嘎吱声、犯人的嚎叫声。当帕斯卡离开的时候，你注意到他的头骨上出现了两个血洞，是以相当精确的手法钻出来的。犯人大小不一的瞳孔不断抽搐着。{/n}

languages.text: "Anfrage genehmigt." {n}Du siehst, wie die Schatten von Pasqals {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Mechadendriten{/g} sich dem Gefangenen näher, ehe der Körper des Techpriesters dir die Sicht versperrt. Du hörst das Kreischen des Bohrers, das Knacken von Knochen, die Schreie des Gefangenen. Als Pasqal wieder zurücktritt, bemerkst du zwei blutende, präzise Löcher im Schädel des Gefangenen. Seine Pupillen sind unterschiedlich groß und zucken.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Request approved." {n}You watch the shadows of Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g} advance on the prisoner before the Tech-Priest's frame blocks your view. You hear the shriek of the drill, the crunching of bone, and screams. When Pasqal withdraws, you notice two bleeding, precisely made holes in the prisoner's skull, as well as his twitching, differently sized pupils.{/n}

Du hörst das Kreischen des Bohrers, das Knacken von Knochen, die Schreie des Gefangenen. Als Pasqal wieder zurücktritt, bemerkst du zwei blutende, präzise Löcher im Schädel des Gefangenen. Seine Pupillen sind unterschiedlich groß und zucken.{/n}

"Anfrage genehmigt." {n}Du siehst, wie die Schatten von Pasqals Mechadendriten sich dem Gefangenen näher, ehe der Körper des Techpriesters dir die Sicht versperrt. Du hörst das Kreischen des Bohrers, das Knacken von Knochen, die Schreie des Gefangenen. Als Pasqal wieder zurücktritt, bemerkst du zwei blutende, präzise Löcher im Schädel des Gefangenen. Seine Pupillen sind unterschiedlich groß und zucken.{/n}

languages.text: « Demande approuvée. » {n}Vous regardez les ombres projetées par les {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mécadendrites{/g} de Pasqal s'approcher du prisonnier avant que la silhouette du technoprêtre bloque votre champ de vision. Vous entendez le bourdonnement strident de la perceuse, le craquement d'os fracturés et les hurlements de la victime. Quand Pasqal bat en retraite, vous remarquez deux trous sanguinolents, nets et précis, dans le crâne de l'homme dont les pupilles agitées de convulsions présentent une dilatation inégale.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Request approved." {n}You watch the shadows of Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g} advance on the prisoner before the Tech-Priest's frame blocks your view. When Pasqal withdraws, you notice two bleeding, precisely made holes in the prisoner's skull, as well as his twitching, differently sized pupils.{/n}

languages.text: "Talep onaylandı." {n}Pasqal'ın {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mekadentritlerinden{/g} yansıyan gölgelerin mahkûma doğru ilerleyişini seyrediyorsun. Ardından Tekno Rahip'in bedeni, görüşünü engelliyor. Matkabın haykırışını, kemiklerin parçalanışını ve atılan çığlıkları duyuyorsun. Pasqal geri çekildiğinde mahkûmun kafatasındaki büyük bir hassasiyetle açılmış, kanayan iki deliğin yanı sıra farklı boyutlardaki titreşen göz bebeklerini fark ediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Request approved." {n}You watch the shadows of Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g} advance on the prisoner before the Tech-Priest's frame blocks your view. You hear the shriek of the drill, the crunching of bone, and screams. When Pasqal withdraws, you notice two bleeding, precisely made holes in the prisoner's skull, as well as his twitching, differently sized pupils.{/n}
